channel.title: [PI]Vote4cash error
channel.description: Hey everyone, I am trying to add vote4cash on my server. My server is a project insanity. I have followed the "Vote for Items" tutorial by Joshua F on Run3-Serv3r. I did all the PhP parts and I added the table into my database. I added the checkVote void into my MysqlHandler class and add the import in my Client class. When it comes to adding this [code]MysqlManager.checkVote(this);[/code] To my [code]public void initialize() {[/code] It nulls my server, and makes it so no one can log in. Can anyone fix this? Thanks in advance.
